thread.title: Buhari appoints CEO, executive directors for BoA
thread.title_full: Buhari appoints CEO, executive directors for BoA

author: Olusola Babarinsa
title: Buhari appoints CEO, executive directors for BoA
text:
It’s been going on before this reporter was born. Find news. Hallowed Olu 
I commend the writer for the thorough report. Let us show kindness to the people in genuine need of help around us. These people include genuine beggars on the streets but also neighbors and friends with challenging difficulties. solomonlas 
This is another lazy Yoruba fool they are generally like this faking anything fakeable Finalman 
Foolish Solomon, Amarachi Eke and Chioma Eze are Yoruba? Shows you’re indeed unwise. Also the guys from Plateau are Yorubas as well? People like you can’t reason beyond your nose and every little thing is ascribed to a particular ethnic group or region. Go for a psychiatric check-up. BugsyMcgraw 
Punch, kindly investigate these cases properly and recommend any two (2) that are redeemable subject to funding then email me at [email protected] . That’s my humble PSR (Private Social Responsibility). May God help us all. NaijaMindOfChange 
That is what PDP and GEJ have caused Nigerians and am sure they are happy to see people beg and do all kind of poverty characteristic. kaka 
probablly all the beggers we have in the north before the millitary and post millitary era were caused by the PDP and GEJ. ignorant is a big problem, i will advice u to grow up DIKE
